description: Lists the job executions for the specified thing. Requires permission to access the ListJobExecutionsForThing action.

parameters.name: namespaceId
parameters.description: The namespace used to indicate that a job is a customer-managed job. When you specify a value for this parameter, Amazon Web Services IoT Core sends jobs notifications to MQTT topics that contain the value in the following format. $aws/things/THING_NAME/jobs/JOB_ID/notify-namespace-NAMESPACE_ID/

nested_items.name: executionSummaries
nested_items.description: A list of job execution summaries.

nested_items.name: jobId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier you assigned to this job when it was created.

nested_items.name: jobExecutionSummary
nested_items.description: Contains a subset of information about a job execution.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The status of the job execution.

nested_items.name: queuedAt
nested_items.description: The time, in seconds since the epoch, when the job execution was queued.

nested_items.name: startedAt
nested_items.description: The time, in seconds since the epoch, when the job execution started.

nested_items.name: lastUpdatedAt
nested_items.description: The time, in seconds since the epoch, when the job execution was last updated.

nested_items.name: executionNumber
nested_items.description: A string (consisting of the digits '0' through '9') which identifies this particular job execution on this particular device. It can be used later in commands which return or update job execution information.

nested_items.name: retryAttempt
nested_items.description: The number that indicates how many retry attempts have been completed for this job on this device.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: The token for the next set of results, or null if there are no additional results.
